title: 23 Cheap But Expensive-Looking Bathroom Accents (That You Can Buy on Amazon)
text:
Surprising — and affordable! — bathroom finds on Amazon. Photo: Courtesy of the retailers

Whether you’re a shower or bath person or a sheet-mask-every-day person, chances are you spend a lot of time in your bathroom. And while we’ve rounded up the best accents for your apartment before, here we’ve dug through Amazon to find the best bathroom-décor ideas. Below, you’ll find spruced-up versions of necessities and spa-like indulgences to give your grooming routine, whatever it may be, a tad more ambiance.

Paddywax Urban Collection Scented Soy Wax Candle A candle with notes of bergamot and mahogany that’ll make your bathroom smell like a fancy forest. $18 at Amazon Buy $18 at Amazon Buy

Japanese Binchotan Scrub Towels More charcoal, this time in a towel. Beauty enthusiasts swear by the powers of exfoliating with charcoal towels. $21 at Amazon Buy $21 at Amazon Buy

Brussel's Live Lucky Bamboo - 5 Stalks Bamboo is one of the few indoor plants that will do just fine in a humid and low-light environment like a bathroom. $24 at Amazon Buy $24 at Amazon Buy

Brabantia Step Trash Can, 1.3 Gallons This small white trash can from Brabantia is a sophisticated upgrade from boring stainless steel. $36 at Amazon Buy $36 at Amazon Buy

Colorful Shower Curtain $26 (was $37, now 30% off) Wake up each morning with a shower inspired by Damien Hirst polka dots. $26 at Amazon Buy $26 at Amazon Buy

Gobam Bamboo Bath Mat Strategist editors love a bamboo bathmat, not only because it seems like something you’d see at a fancy spa, but also because it means you will never wash a grimy bathroom rug again. $30 at Amazon Buy $30 at Amazon Buy

SONGMICS Bamboo Shower Stool and Shelf This bamboo shower stool doubles as a small shelf with storage for towels or toiletries on the bottom. $60 at Amazon Buy $60 at Amazon Buy

LANGYASHAN Canvas Storage Bin Use the basket as a hamper or storage for linens — the handy straps make it easy to tote. $11 at Amazon Buy $11 at Amazon Buy

Pendleton National Park Hand Towel The signature stripes of Glacier National Park — now for your guests to enjoy. $15 at Amazon Buy $15 at Amazon Buy

Radius Scuba Toothbrushes As fun as these are to look at, they’re even more fun to use, with their giant bristle heads and comfy rubber grips. $25 at Amazon Buy $25 at Amazon Buy

YAMAZAKI home Toilet Paper Stocker Use this to keep all your extra rolls of toilet paper on hand but out of sight. It also doubles as a small freestanding shelf. $45 at Amazon Buy $45 at Amazon Buy

Muji Porcelain Toothbrush Stand Sleeker than your average brush holder. Plus, its design keeps residue from yucking up the base. $8 at Amazon Buy $8 at Amazon Buy

Photo: Courtesy of the vendor Yamazaki Home Silicone Soap Tray Pair this with the aforementioned Muji toothbrush stand, and you’ve got a full-on millennial pink sink kit. $21 at Amazon Buy $21 at Amazon Buy
